remarks: Distributive law for the multiplication operation of a semiring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement:
srgdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
srgdi.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
srgdi.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
srgdi $p |- ( ( R e. SRing /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .x. ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( ( X .x. Y ) .+ ( X .x. Z ) ) ) $.
